suggest.markstory/asset_compress: An asset compression plugin which provides file concatenation and a flexible filter system for preprocessing and minification.
suggest.dereuromark/cakephp-ide-helper: After baking your code, this keeps your annotations in sync with the code evolving from there on for maximum IDE and PHPStan compatibility.
suggest.phpunit/phpunit: Allows automated tests to be run without system-wide install.
suggest.cakephp/cakephp-codesniffer: Allows to check the code against the coding standards used in CakePHP.
